stimulusHtml: Find the position of the particle when t = 2.5 .

features.html: During the time period from t = 0 to t = 6 seconds, a particle moves along the path given by x ( t ) = 3 cos ( π t ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaGaamiEaiaacI cacaWG0bGaaiykaiabg2da9iaaiodaciGGJbGaai4BaiaacohacaGG OaGaeqiWdaNaamiDaiaacMcaaaa@41EA@ and y ( t ) = 5 sin ( π t ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaGaamyEaiaacI cacaWG0bGaaiykaiabg2da9iaaiwdaciGGZbGaaiyAaiaac6gacaGG OaGaeqiWdaNaamiDaiaacMcaaaa@41F2@ .
